title: Sales figures for Volkswagen by brand 2014 to 2018
summary: This is a multi-line chart with 9 lines representing Volkswagen Passenger Cars, Audi, Skoda, Seat, VW Commercial Vehicles, Porsche, MAN Commercial Vehicles, Scania, and Bentley. The y axis denotes Sales in thousand vehicles and the x axis denotes Year.
Overall Volkswagen Passenger Cars is gradually decreasing, Audi, Skoda, Seat, VW Commercial Vehicles, Porsche, MAN Commercial Vehicles, Scania, and Bentley are roughly constant,  throughout the Year
Overall across the Year, Volkswagen Passenger Cars mostly maintained the highest Sales in thousand vehicles when compared to others with a mean value of 4128.4, and it peaked at 2014.
Followed by Audi which ranks as the second topmpost line , with an average of 1500.8 Sales in thousand vehicles,reaching its highest point  at 2016 with a value of 1534.0.
The botommost line, Bentley,  has a mean of 10.8, and peaked at 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017.

Throughout the period, Volkswagen Passenger Cars generally had the highest Sales in thousand vehicles relative to others with an average of 4128.4, and it reached its maximum at 2014 with a value of 4583.0.
Followed by Audi which ranks as the second topmpost line , with an average of 1500.8 Sales in thousand vehicles,reaching its highest point  at 2016 with a value of 1534.0.
The botommost line, Bentley,  has a mean of 10.8, and peaked at 2014, 2015, 2016, and 2017.
